დამადასტურებელ ბმულს ვადა გაუვა 24 საათში.
emailSent.spam_folder:
თუ რამდენიმე წუთში ინბოქსში არ მიიღებთ ჩვენგან წერილს,
გთხოვთ, შეამოწმოთ თქვენი „Junk mail“ ან „Spam“ საქაღალდეები.

docs.upload_your_documents: გთხოვთ აქ ატვირთოთ კომპანიის მიერ მოთხოვნილი დასკანერებული და სხვა ელექტრონული დოკუმენტები.

employmentEligibility.citizen: A citizen is someone who was born in the United States or is a naturalized citizen living in the United States.
employmentEligibility.noncitizen: A noncitizen national is someone born in American Samoa, certain former citizens of the former Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, and certain children of noncitizen nationals born abroad.
employmentEligibility.resident: A lawful permanent resident is someone who is not a US citizen and who resides under legally recognized and lawfully recorded permanent residence as an immigrant.
employmentEligibility.authorized: An alien authorized to work includes anyone who is authorized to work in the United States but is not a US citizen, US national or lawful permanent resident.
employmentEligibility.fill_digit_number: Fill in a 7-9 digit USCIS Number or Alien Registration Number (include the "A")
employmentEligibility.your_eligibility: The federal government requires verification of your eligibility to work in the US.
employmentEligibility.legally_allowed: This info will be used to fill out Form I-9, which proves that you’re legally allowed to work in the US.
employmentEligibility.fill_admission_number: Fill in your 11 digit I-94 admission number

formI9.form_i_9_records: Form I-9 records your authorization to work in the USA.
formI9.please_review_information: Please review the information and sign the document.
formI9.agree_electronicall: I agree to electronically sign this form. I am aware that federal law provides for imprisonment and/or fines for false statements or use of false documents in connection with the completion of this form.
formI9.agree_electronicall_attest: I agree to electronically sign this form. I attest, under penalty of perjury, that I have assisted in the completion of Section 1 of this form and that to the best of my knowledge the information is true and correct.
formI9.electronically: I agree to electronically sign this form. I attest, under penalty of perjury, that (1) I have examined the document(s) presented by the above-named employee, (2) the above-listed document(s) appear to genuine and to relate to the employee named, and (3) to the best of my knowledge the employee is authorized to work in the United States.

onboardingReview.successfully_signed: You have successfully signed {{firstName}}'s Form I-9!
onboardingReview.authorization_documents: Please select employee's identification and work authorization documents
onboardingReview.please_fill: Please fill the information in the following fields:

eligibilityDocuments.to_compete_form_i9:
To compete {{firstName}}'s Form I-9, please physically examine the employee's identification and work authorization documents.
To be federally compliant, this should happen within the employee's first 3 days at work.
eligibilityDocuments.what_documents_employee: What documents did the employee bring?
eligibilityDocuments.from_list_c: You have to select one selection from List A or a combination of one selection from List B and one selection from List C
eligibilityDocuments.employment_authorization:
Documents that Establish Both Identity
and Employment Authorization
eligibilityDocuments.listed_above:
For persons under age 18 who are
unable to present a document listed above:

documentInformation.enter_information_employee: Enter the information for the documents provided by the employee
documentInformation.the_employee_part: The employee is part of the Student and Exchange Visitor Program (SEVP)
documentInformation.permanent_resident_card: Permanent Resident Card or Alien Registration Receipt Card (Form I-551)
documentInformation.foreign_passport_with_temporary: Foreign passport with temporary I-551 stamp or printed notation on a MRIV
documentInformation.employment_authorization: Employment Authorization Document that contains a photograph (Form I-766)
documentInformation.certificate_eligibility_nonimmigrant: Certificate of Eligibility for Nonimmigrant (F-1) Student Status (Form I-20)
documentInformation.certificate_eligibility_exchange: Certificate of Eligibility for Exchange Visitor (J-1) Status (Form DS-2019)
documentInformation.arrival_departure: Arrival/departure Record (Form I-94 or Form I-94A)
documentInformation.passport_from_federal: Passport from the Federal States of Micronesia or Republic of Marshall Islands
documentInformation.drivers_license_state_issued_card: Driver’s license or state-issued ID card
documentInformation.photo_id_card_issued_agency: Photo ID card issued by federal, state, or local government agency
documentInformation.us_military_card_draft_record: US Military card or draft record
documentInformation.us_coast_guard_merchant_card: US Coast Guard Merchant Mariner Card
documentInformation.drivers_license_issued_government: Driver’s license issued by the Canadian government
documentInformation.certification_report: Certification of report of birth issued by the Department of State (Forms DS-1350, FS-545, FS-240)
documentInformation.original_certified_birth: Original or certified birth certificate issued by a US state, county, municipality, or territory
documentInformation.authorization_issued_department_homeland: Employment authorization issued by the Department of Homeland Security

onboardingInfoBox.review_and_signature: {{firstName}}-ს ფორმა I-9 ელოდება თქვენს განხილვას და ხელმოწერას
onboardingInfoBox.personal_information_address:
{{firstName}} has been invited to Self-Onboarding to fill in details such as Personal Information, Address, Contact Information, Emergency Contact, Documents and Employment Eligibility.
You will get a notification as soon as {{firstName}} finishes. You can then review this information, approve and sign Section 2 of Form I-9 to finalize {{firstName}}'s hiring process.
onboardingInfoBox.hiring_process: {{firstName}} მოწვეულია თვით-რეგისტრაციაზე, რათა შეავსოს ისეთი დეტალები, როგორიცაა პირადი ინფორმაცია, მისამართი, საკონტაქტო ინფორმაცია, განსაკუთრებულ შემთხვევებში კონტაქტო პირის ინფორმაცია, დოკუმენტები.
onboardingInfoBox.hiring_process_for_reviewer:
{{firstName}} მოწვეულია თვით-რეგისტრაციაზე, რათა შეავსოს ისეთი დეტალები, როგორიცაა პირადი ინფორმაცია, მისამართი, საკონტაქტო ინფორმაცია, განსაკუთრებულ შემთხვევებში კონტაქტო პირის ინფორმაცია, დოკუმენტები.
თქვენ მიიღებთ შეტყობინებას, როგორც კი {{firstName}} დაასრულებს პროცესს. ამის შემდეგ შეგიძლიათ გადახედოთ ამ ინფორმაციას და დაადასტუროთ {{firstName}}-ს აყვანის პროცესის დასრულება.
onboardingInfoBox.start_section: {{firstName}} has completed personal details, uploaded documents and signed Section 1 of Form I-9. Please review and approve {{firstName}}'s information to start Section 2 of Form I-9.
onboardingInfoBox.completed_personal_details: {{firstName}} has completed personal details and signed Section 1 of Form I-9. Please review and approve {{firstName}}'s information to start Section 2 of Form I-9.
onboardingInfoBox.please_review_and_approve: {{firstName}}-მ შეავსო პირადი ინფორმაცია და ატვირთა შესაბამისი დოკუმენტები. გთხოვთ, გადახედოთ და დაადასტუროთ {{firstName}}-ს ინფორმაცია.
onboardingInfoBox.please_review_approve_information: {{firstName}}-მ შეიყვანა პირადი ინფორმაცია. გთხოვთ, გადახედოთ და დაადასტუროთ {{firstName}}-ს ინფორმაცია.

onboardingInfoBox.are_you_sure_you_want_cancel: დარწმუნებული ხართ, რომ გსურთ გააუქმოთ თვით-რეგისტრაციის პროცესი {{firstName}}-სთვის?

globaly.timesheet_feature:
დროის უწყისის ფუნქციონალი მზადდება და ძალიან მალე იქნება ხელმისაწვდომი ჩვენი მომხმარებლებისთვის.
თუმცა გაითვალისწინეთ რომ ეს ფუნქცია ხელმისაწვდომი იქნება მხოლოდ ფასიან ვერსიებში.
globaly.timeoff_feature:
შვებულებების ფუნქციონალი მზადდება და ძალიან მალე იქნება ხელმისაწვდომი ჩვენი მომხმარებლებისთვის.
თუმცა გაითვალისწინეთ რომ ეს ფუნქცია ხელმისაწვდომი იქნება მხოლოდ ფასიან ვერსიებში.
